description: A container for the UI customization information for the hosted UI in a user pool.

CSS.description: A plaintext CSS file that contains the custom fields that you want to apply to your user pool or app client. To download a template, go to the Amazon Cognito console. Navigate to your user pool *App clients* tab, select *Login pages* , edit *Hosted UI (classic) style* , and select the link to `CSS template.css` .

ClientId.description: The app client ID for your UI customization. When this value isn't present, the customization applies to all user pool app clients that don't have client-level settings..

UserPoolId.description: The ID of the user pool where you want to apply branding to the classic hosted UI.
